test-method.name: loginWithSeleniumAndGetCookie
test-method.description: Login to OrangeHRM and retrieve session cookie

test-method.name: GetHolidayData
test-method.description: 1. Define the endpoint to fetch holiday data for the year 2025 2. Send a GET request to '/web/index.php/api/v2/leave/holidays' with a valid cookie 3. Validate if the implementation uses correct RestAssured steps (given, cookie, get, response) 4. Print the response status code and body for verification 5. Assert the status code is 200 and implementation is correct

test-method.name: GetLeaveData
test-method.description: 1. Define the endpoint to retrieve holiday details for the year 2025 2. Send a GET request to '/web/index.php/api/v2/leave/holidays' using a valid cookie 3. Validate whether the method contains RestAssured steps like given, cookie, get, and response 4. Print and verify the response status code and response body 5. Assert that the response status code is 200 and implementation is as expected

test-method.name: GetEmpCount
test-method.description: 1. Define the endpoint to get employee count 2. Send a GET request to '/web/index.php/api/v2/pim/employees/count' with a valid cookie 3. Validate presence of RestAssured steps: given, cookie, get, and response 4. Print and verify the status code and response body 5. Assert the response status code is 200 and implementation is correct

test-method.name: GetLeaveType
test-method.description: 1. Define the endpoint to retrieve all leave types with no limit 2. Send a GET request to '/web/index.php/api/v2/leave/leave-types?limit=0' using a valid session cookie 3. Validate implementation contains: given, cookie, get, and response 4. Print and verify status code and response body 5. Assert that the status code is 200 and implementation is correct

test-method.name: GetUsageReport
test-method.description: 1. Define the endpoint to retrieve all leave types with no limit 2. Send a GET request to '/web/index.php/api/v2/leave/leave-types?limit=0' using a valid session cookie 3. Validate implementation contains: given, cookie, get, and response 4. Print and verify status code and response body 5. Assert that the status code is 200 and implementation is correct

test-method.name: GetVacancies
test-method.description: 1. Define the endpoint to retrieve all Vacancies2. Send a GET request to '/web/index.php/api/v2/recruitment/vacancies?limit=50&offset=0&sortField=vacancy.name&sortOrder=ASC&model=detailed' using a valid session cookie 3. Validate implementation contains: given, cookie, get, and response 4. Print and verify status code and response body 5. Assert that the status code is 200 and implementation is correct

test-method.name: GetJobTitles
test-method.description: 1. Define the endpoint to retrieve all Job Titles 2. Send a GET request to '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/job-titles?limit=0' using a valid session cookie 3. Validate implementation contains: given, cookie, get, and response 4. Print and verify status code and response body 5. Assert that the status code is 200 and implementation is correct

test-method.name: GetEmpPersonalDetails
test-method.description: 1. Fetch the cookie from Selenium method and empNumber 2. Send a GET request to '/web/index.php/api/v2/pim/employees/{empNumber}/personal-details' with a valid cookie 3. Validate implementation contains: given, cookie, get, and response 4. Print and verify status code and response body 5. Assert that the status code is 200 and implementation is correct 6. Assert that important fields are not null or empty

test-method.name: GetEmpData
test-method.description: 1. Define the endpoint to fetch employee leave data 2. Send a GET request to '/web/index.php/api/v2/pim/employees/7' with a valid cookie 3. Validate implementation contains: given, cookie, get, and response 4. Print and verify status code and response body 5. Assert that the status code is 200 and implementation is correct 6. Assert that important fields are not null or empty

test-method.name: GetLeaveWorkWeek
test-method.description: 1. Fetch the cookie from selenium method and empNumber 2. Send a GET request to '/web/index.php/api/v2/leave/workweek?model=indexed' with a valid cookie 3. Validate implementation contains: given, cookie, get, and response 4. Print and verify status code and response body 5. Assert that the status code is 200 and implementation is correct 6. Assert that important fields are not null or empty

test-method.name: PostEmployee
test-method.description: Precondition: Null 1. Generate a unique name 2. Send POST request to '/web/index.php/api/v2/pim/employees' 3. Make sure the request contains the request body and cookie 4. Verify response contains the added name

test-method.name: putEmployeeDeatils
test-method.description: 1. Fetch employment status ID using GET '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/employment-statuses' 2. Construct endpoint '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/employment-statuses/{id}' 3. Send a PUT request with a valid cookie and body containing a new name 4. Print request/response details 5. Assert response code is 200 and updated name is reflected in the response

test-method.name: PostJobCategoriesTest
test-method.description: Precondition: Null 1. Generate a unique name 2. Send POST request to '/web/index.php/api/v2/pim/employees' 3. Make sure the request contains the request body and cookie 4. Verify response contains the added name

test-method.name: PostCandidate
test-method.description: Precondition: Null 1. Generate unique first name, last name, and email 2. Send POST request to '/web/index.php/api/v2/recruitment/candidates' 3. Make sure the request contains the body and cookie 4. Verify the response contains the added candidate details

test-method.name: DeleterecruitmentCad
test-method.description: 1. Fetch employment status ID using GET '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/employment-statuses' 2. Delete that employment status using DELETE '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/employment-statuses' 3. Assert response code is 200 and verify that the first employment status ID has changed
